description: The file defines the UI page for managing diet plans, including listing, paginating, creating, editing, and deleting diet plans, using Flutter widgets with provider for state management.

classes.name: DietPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of diet plans with pagination, allows creation, editing, and deletion of plans.

classes.name: _DietFormDialog
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing a dialog form to create or edit a diet plan.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Lifecycle method to initialize data loading when dependencies change.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the main diet page UI including list and pagination controls.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows a dialog to confirm deletion of a diet plan and performs delete if confirmed.

methods.name: _openForm
methods.description: Opens the diet plan creation/edit dialog.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the form controllers with existing data if editing.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the alert dialog form for creating or editing a diet plan.
